Constructor Detail

init

public init(string password, [string username=''], [string adminApiPath=''])
Constructor. Connects to correct CFMLAdmin API engine layer

Parameters:
password - administrator password
username - administrator username (ColdFusion 8+ only)
adminApiPath - override default Admin API path (ColdFusion & Open BlueDragon only)

Parameters:

setDatasource

public void setDatasource(string name, [string description], string databasetype, [string database], [string server], [string username], [string password], [numeric port], [string additionalConnectionParameters], [numeric loginTimeout], [numeric connectionTimeout], [boolean connectionPooling], [numeric maxConnections], [boolean allowSQL_select], [boolean allowSQL_insert], [boolean allowSQL_update], [boolean allowSQL_delete], [boolean allowSQL_storedprocedure], [boolean allowSQL_create], [boolean allowSQL_alter], [boolean allowSQL_drop], [boolean allowSQL_grant], [boolean allowSQL_revoke], [boolean allowSQL_blob], [boolean allowSQL_clob], [string jdbcURL], [string jdbcClass])
Creates a datasource

Parameters:
name - datasource name
description - description for datasource
databasetype - database type
  • jdbc
  • mssql
  • mysql
  • oracle
  • postgresql
database - name of database to use (or SID for Oracle)
server - database server
username - database username
password - database password
port - database port (will use databasetype default unless specified)
additionalConnectionParameters - additional parameters for database connection
loginTimeout - login timeout (in seconds)
connectionTimeout - timeout for database connection (in seconds)
connectionPooling - is the connection pooled
maxConnections - maximum number of connections allowed
allowSQL_select - are SQL select statements allowed
allowSQL_insert - are SQL insert statements allowed
allowSQL_update - are SQL update statements allowed
allowSQL_delete - are SQL delete statements allowed
allowSQL_storedprocedure - are SQL stored procedures allowed
allowSQL_create - are SQL create statements allowed
allowSQL_alter - are SQL alter statements allowed
allowSQL_drop - are SQL drop statements allowed
allowSQL_grant - are SQL grant statements allowed
allowSQL_revoke - are SQL revoke statements allowed
allowSQL_blob - are SQL blobs allowed
allowSQL_clob - are SQL clobs allowed
jdbcURL - JDBC URL to use (databasetype='jdbc' only)
jdbcClass - Class for JDBC Driver (databasetype='jdbc' only)

setJavaCFX

public void setJavaCFX(string cfxName, string class, [string description=''])
Creates a Java CFX

Parameters:
cfxName - Name of tag, beginning with cfx_
class - class/package name (without .class or .jar extension) that implements the Java CFX
description - description of tag usage

setMapping

public void setMapping(string mapName, string mapPath)
Creates a mapping

Parameters:
mapName - Name of mapping to be created
mapPath - Path that is related to the mapping

verifyDatasource

public boolean verifyDatasource(string dsn)
Verifies a given data source name

Parameters:
dsn - Name of the datasource to be verified
